message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.LG. 

The paper proposes a new approach for generating informative image captions by incorporating named entities retrieved via hashtags. This involves the use of computer vision (CV) techniques to analyze the input image, natural language processing (NLP) techniques to generate the template caption, and knowledge graph-based collective inference algorithm to fill in the template with specific named entities. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also involves NLP techniques, which suggests that it could also belong to cs.CL (Computation and Language). The use of knowledge graphs and collective inference algorithm suggests that it could belong to cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.IR (Information Retrieval). Finally, the use of machine learning techniques to train the model suggests that it could also belong to cs.LG (Machine Learning).
